nodes.text: The Fight in the Forest (originally titled Hero vs. Villain) is a young readers book in the World of Reading series written by Nate Millici and illustrated by Pilot Studio that adapts the conclusion of Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. A level two title, the book was published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press on January 17, 2017 and comprises 32 pages.
This Level 2 reader retells the stunning conclusion of Star Wars: The Force Awakens with all-new illustrations!
